title: 怎么获取NPCmod的怪物名[已解决]
author: 楠木i

replies.author: wshycaa
replies.txt_content: npcmod的怪物名用getCustomName()貌似是get不到的。你试试用getName()

replies.author: 楠木i
replies.txt_content:
wshycaa 发表于 2019-2-2 18:45
npcmod的怪物名用getCustomName()貌似是get不到的。你试试用getName()
貌似没办法get到。

replies.author: 周润发
replies.txt_content: 请问是怎么获取的 我也被这个问题卡脖子了 老哥能否告知一下

replies.author: ttc_V
replies.txt_content: 问下楼主最后是怎么解决的 [:dragon:]

replies.author: JimySpirits
replies.txt_content: 获取NBT 从NBT里找tag就可以了

replies.author: Rancy.
replies.txt_content: 可以延时几秒后尝试获取.
